### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style
- [ ] I have run `make fmt` to format my code
- [ ] I have run `make lint` and fixed any issues
- [ ] I have run `go vet ./...` with no issues

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All existing tests pass (`go test ./...`)
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (for user-facing changes)

### Security

- [ ] I have not committed any secrets or credentials
- [ ] I have not committed any personal data
